wordsToFind.bonusInfo: Something amazingly special facts about satisfaction!
Perhaps a fun fact about emotions?
Nothing makes you feel good like feelings. True story.

content.data: Life satisfaction is the way in which people show their emotions, feelings and how they feel about their directions and options for the future. It is a measure of well-being.
